originalText.text: I did a session of Piqo4 for treatment of my dark spots in face. The results are quite well. Now the color is much lighter. The treatment specialist is very professional and explained the after care measures too.

text.text: I did a session of Piqo4 for treatment of my dark spots in face. The results are quite well. Now the color is much lighter. The treatment specialist is very professional and explained the after care measures too.

originalText.text:
I’m obsessed with my new silk lashes! They feel  so natural and look amazing, even after a few weeks. Can’t go back to the regular ones.

I’ve been getting lash extensions for a long time. I love the way lashes look, but hate how heavy and brittle they get. Silk is much more expensive than other synthetic lashes because it’s weightless, so I’m shocked that Ouie offers their silk for such a reasonable price.

Ask for Yoly. She is very experienced and meticulous. I loved how she shaped my lashes exactly the way I wanted.

originalText.text: All staffs are professional. Products are in high quality.  After 2 treatments, my face got so much better already.  My sister saw my results and we go together now. She was really picky and she likes this place too.

text.text: All staffs are professional. Products are in high quality.  After 2 treatments, my face got so much better already.  My sister saw my results and we go together now. She was really picky and she likes this place too.

originalText.text:
I have never been a fan of any particular spa. However, I have been here for a Casmara facial 3x already. After my 3rd try, I finally decided that I will like to come back again so I decided to buy a 5 facial package with them because not only did I see glowy, hydrated skin right after, but I saw it for the next couple of weeks. Even though I consistently put moisturizer twice a day with quality products, my skin seems to always have a dull complexion. Until I had the Casmara hydrating facial. I have never felt results for such an extended period of time.
I've had a different aesthetician each time, and each had their own techniques with massages that felt so refreshing.
The environment is very clean, crisp, and comfortable. The staff is extremely professional and accommodating.
Many of us know how hard it is to find that IT place for self-care. I'm glad that I have found mine, and it is OUÏE Skin Care.

originalText.text: My friend went there to do eyebrows tattoo today. Omg it’s super natural and nice. I can’t wait to do mine. Sandy is the best!!!!!!!
